title: Kum ba yah
lyrics:
Kum ba yah, my Lord, kum ba yah.
Kum ba yah, my Lord, kum ba yah.
Kum ba yah, my Lord, kum ba yah.
Oh, Lord, kum ba yah!

Someone's singing, Lord, kum ba yah.
Someone's singing, Lord, kum ba yah.
Someone's singing, Lord, kum ba yah.
Oh, Lord, kum ba yah!

Someone's laughing, Lord, kum ba yah.
Someone's laughing, Lord, kum ba yah.
Someone's laughing, Lord, kum ba yah.
Oh, Lord, kum ba yah!

Someone's weeping, Lord, kum ba yah.
Someone's weeping, Lord, kum ba yah.
Someone's weeping, Lord, kum ba yah.
Oh, Lord, kum ba yah!
